product_name: The North Face Jacquardigan Cardigan Sweater - Women's
long_description: Slip on The North Face Jacquardigan women's cardigan sweater and cozy up with a cup of hot chocolate after a long, cold day outside. Its wool-blended fabric offers a soft feel and rejuvenating warmth. The North Face Jacquardigan women's sweater is made of an acrylic/nylon/wool blend, and falls to mid-thigh for extra coverage. Full-length button placket; rib-knit collar, cuffs and hem; hand pockets; logo patch at cuffs.
short_description: Slip on The North Face Jacquardigan women's cardigan sweater and cozy up with a cup of hot chocolate after a long, cold day outside. Its wool-blended fabric offers a soft feel and rejuvenating warmth.
